nodes.text: The Freklas Snarl Circus was a circus known for inventing the concept of Random Audience Death. Private guard Prod worked with this circus as a terroga trainer for some time.

Freklas Snarl Circus was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
